name: aaiti
description: A.A.I.T.I v1.0 - Auto AI Trading Interface: Production-Ready Neural Command Deck for AI-Powered Trading

scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npx serve -s build -l 3000
scripts.build:all: npm run build && echo 'Build complete - ready for production'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.install:clean: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.install:production: npm run clean && npm install --production && cd backend && npm install --production && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules && rm -rf frontend/build
scripts.clean:cache: npm cache clean --force && cd backend && npm cache clean --force && cd ../frontend && npm cache clean --force
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:cache && rm -f package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json
scripts.health: curl -s http://localhost:5000/api/health | python3 -m json.tool || echo 'Backend not running'
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:all && echo 'Setup complete - ready to start!'
